name: Nami (itch)
description:
Make sure hardware acceleration is enabled before playing.  If you create a level that you want to be featured in the game, go to the about section for information on how to send it to me.  

Controls:

CT1:

Z = Left

X = Right

C = Jump

V = Shoot

CT2:

B = Left

N =Right

M = Jump

Comma = Shoot

T1:

7 = Left

8 = Right

9 = Jump

0 = Shoot

T2:

1 = Left

2 = Right

3= Jump

4 = Shoot
